item.title: [B][COLOR yellow]Welcome to TV Shows Based on Comics[/COLOR][/B]

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Adventures of Superman[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Announcer: "The Adventures of Superman. Faster than a speeding bullet! More powerful than a locomotive! Able to leap tall buildings at a single bound!"

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Arrow[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Spoiled billionaire playboy Oliver Queen is missing and presumed dead when his yacht is lost at sea. He returns five years later a changed man, determined to clean up the city as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Batman[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Wealthy entrepreneur Bruce Wayne and his ward Dick Grayson lead a double life: they are actually crime fighting duo Batman and Robin. A secret Batpole in the Wayne mansion leads to the Batcave, where Police Commissioner Gordon often calls with the latest emergency threatening Gotham City. Racing to the scene of the crime in the Batmobile, Batman and Robin must (with the help of their trusty Bat-utility-belt) thwart the efforts of a variety of master criminals, including The Riddler, The Joker, Catwoman, and The Penguin.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Birds of Prey[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Huntress, Dinah, Oracle are determined to carry on Batman's fight for justice against the ruthless criminals of New Gotham City

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Black Lightning[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Jefferson Pierce is a man wrestling with a secret. As the father of two daughters and principal of a charter high school that also serves as a safe haven for young people in a New Orleans neighborhood overrun by gang violence, he is a hero to his community.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Constantine[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: A man struggling with his faith who is haunted by the sins of his past is suddenly thrust into the role of defending humanity from the gathering forces of darkness.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]DC's Legend of Tomorrow[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Time-traveling rogue Rip Hunter must recruit a ragtag team of heroes and villains to help prevent an apocalypse that could impact not only Earth, but all of time.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Doom Patrol[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: The Doom Patrol’s members each suffered horrible accidents that gave them superhuman abilities — but also left them scarred and disfigured. Traumatized and downtrodden, the team found purpose through The Chief, who brought them together to investigate the weirdest phenomena in existence — and to protect Earth from what they find.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Helstrom[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Daimon and Ana Helstrom are the son and daughter of a mysterious and powerful serial killer. The siblings have a complicated dynamic as they track down the terrorizing worst of humanity — each with their attitude and skills.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Jupiter's Legacy[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: As the world's first generation of superheroes (who received their powers in the 1930s) become the revered elder guard in the present, their superpowered children struggle to live up to the legendary feats of their parents.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Katy Keene[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: A group of aspiring artists living in New York City try to make their dreams come true.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Krypton[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Set two generations before the destruction of the legendary Man of Steel’s home planet, Krypton follows Superman’s grandfather — whose House of El was ostracized and shamed — as he fights to redeem his family’s honor and save his beloved world from chaos.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Largo Winch[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Largo (Winch) is the illegitimate son of Nerio Winch, a billionaire industrialist, who did business very much in a greyish manner. When Nerio sensed his time was up he named Largo his heir, who did not know Nerio was his father. Together with Simon, a friend whom he met when he was in prison, Joy, Nerio's bodyguard, Karinsky, a former KGB computer expert, and John Sullivan, Nerio's attorney, Largo tries to right some of the wrongs Nerio may have done and to keep up the good which he has done, and every now and then Largo has to shoot his way out of the situation he finds himself in.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Legion[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: David Haller, AKA Legion, is a troubled young man who may be more than human. Diagnosed as schizophrenic, David has been in and out of psychiatric hospitals for years. But after a strange encounter with a fellow patient, he’s confronted with the possibility that the voice.s he hears and the visions he sees might be real.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Marvels Agent Carter[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: In 1946, Peggy Carter is relegated to secretarial duties in the Strategic Scientific Reserve (SSR). When Howard Stark is accused of treason, he secretly recruits Peggy to clear his name with the help of his butler, Edwin Jarvis.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. [/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Agent Phil Coulson of S.H.I.E.L.D. (Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division) puts together a team of agents to investigate the new, the strange and the unknown around the globe, protecting the ordinary from the extraordinary.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Marvels Cloak and Dagger[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Two teenagers from very different backgrounds awaken to newly acquired superpowers which mysteriously link them to one another.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Marvels DareDevil[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Lawyer-by-day Matt Murdock uses his heightened senses from being blinded as a young boy to fight crime at night on the streets of Hell’s Kitchen as Daredevil.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Marvels Inhumans[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: After the Royal Family of Inhumans is splintered by a military coup, they barely escape to Hawaii where their surprising interactions with the lush world and humanity around them may prove to not only save them, but Earth itself.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Marvels Iron Fist[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Danny Rand resurfaces 15 years after being presumed dead. Now, with the power of the Iron Fist, he seeks to reclaim his past and fulfill his destiny.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Marvels Jessica Jones[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: After a tragic ending to her short-lived super hero stint, Jessica Jones is rebuilding her personal life and career as a detective who gets pulled into cases involving people with extraordinary abilities in New York City.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Marvels Luke Cage[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: When a sabotaged experiment gives him super strength and unbreakable skin, Luke Cage becomes a fugitive attempting to rebuild his life in Harlem and must confront his past and fight a battle for the heart of his city.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Marvels Runaways[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: After discovering their parents are super-villains in disguise, a group of teenagers band together to run away from their homes in order to atone for their parents' actions and to discover the secrets of their origins.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Marvels The Defenders[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Set a few months after the events of the second season of Daredevil, and a month after the events of Iron Fist, the vigilantes Daredevil, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage, and Iron Fist team up in New York City to fight a common enemy: The Hand.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Marvels The Punisher[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: After his revenge on those who murdered his family, aimless Marine veteran Frank Castle finds a new meaning in life as a vigilante known as "The Punisher".

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Ms Marvel[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: A great student, avid gamer, and voracious fan-fic scribe, Kamala Khan has a special affinity for superheroes, particularly Captain Marvel. However, she struggles to fit in at home and at school — that is, until she gets superpowers like the heroes she’s always looked up to. Life is easier with superpowers, right?

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Naomi[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Follow a teen girl’s journey from her small northwestern town to the heights of the multiverse. When a supernatural event shakes her hometown to the core, Naomi sets out to uncover its origins, and what she discovers will challenge everything we believe about our heroes

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Peacemaker[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: The continuing story of Peacemaker – a compellingly vainglorious man who believes in peace at any cost, no matter how many people he has to kill to get it – in the aftermath of the events of “The Suicide Squad.”

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Pennyworth[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: The origin story of Alfred Pennyworth, a former special-forces soldier living in London and how he came to work for Bruce Wayne's father.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Powers[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Set in a world where humans and superheroes co-exist, a homicide detective whose powers were taken from him investigates crimes involving superhumans along with his partner.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Preacher[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: A preacher sets out on a mission to make the almighty himself confess his sin of abandoning the world. With his best friend Cassidy, an alcoholic Irish vampire, his love Tulip, a red blooded gun towing Texan, and the power of genesis, an unholy child born from an angel and a devil, Jesse gives up everything to set the world straight with its creator.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Richie Rich[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Richie Rich is just a normal kid, except he has a trillion dollars. Following his overnight success, he moves his father and his sister into his newly built mansion. He also shares his success with his two best friends, Darcy and Murray.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Riverdale[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Set in the present, the series offers a bold, subversive take on Archie, Betty, Veronica and their friends, exploring the surreality of small-town life, the darkness and weirdness bubbling beneath Riverdale’s wholesome facade.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Sable[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: A children's book writer serves as a mysterious vigilante at night.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Shazam[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: A young boy, able to transform into the superhero Captain Marvel, travels the country fighting evil and helping people.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]She Hulk Attorney at Law[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Jennifer Walters navigates the complicated life of a single, 30-something attorney who also happens to be a green 6-foot-7-inch superpowered hulk.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Snowpiercer[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Seven years after the world has become a frozen wasteland, the remnants of humanity inhabit a perpetually-moving train that circles the globe, where class warfare, social injustice and the politics of survival play out.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Superman and Lois[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: After years of facing megalomaniacal supervillains, monsters wreaking havoc on Metropolis, and alien invaders intent on wiping out the human race, The Man of Steel aka Clark Kent and Lois Lane come face to face with one of their greatest challenges ever: dealing with all the stress, pressures and complexities that come with being working parents in today's society.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Tales from the Crypt[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Tales of horror based on the gruesome E.C. comic books of the 1950s presented by the legendary Crypt Keeper, a sinister ghoul obsessed with gallows humor and horrific puns.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The Crow: Stairway to Heaven[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: The Crow: Stairway to Heaven was a 1998 Canadian television series created by Bryce Zabel spun off from the The Crow film series starring Mark Dacascos in the lead role as Eric Draven, reprising the role originally played by Brandon Lee in the 1994 film The Crow

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The Falcon and the Winter Soldier[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: Following the events of 'Avengers: Endgame,' Sam Wilson/Falcon and Bucky Barnes/Winter Soldier team up in a global adventure that tests their abilities -- and their patience.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]The Incredible Hulk[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: During an experiment gone bad, radiation turns a scientist into a raging green behemoth whenever he becomes agitated. Unable to control his transformations, David Banner searches for a cure as he crosses the country, fugitive-style, with a dogged tabloid reporter on his trail.

dir.name: [B][I][COLOR white]Witchblade[/COLOR][/I][/B]
dir.summary: NYPD Det. Sara Pezzini has a supernatural weapon and abilities to help her fight evil.
